name: 20 Below Neon
description:
20 Below Neon: mint dots, small navy, neon blue, and light blue hexagons, and small light blue squares in a clear base

I really love neon, and don't understand the aversion to it in the winter. Therefore, this polish is a subtle ode to my love of neon blue, but with a winter twist.

----------------------

This polish is part of the Dotticure Collection, debuted December 3, 2013. 

While I celebrate and LOVE Christmas time, I totally get that nobody wants a one-day polish. The Dotticure Collection is a fun group of polishes that are winter-appropriate, but can also be worn on Boxing Day, any of the eight days of Hanukkah, or on Christmas. Additionally, all polishes in the collection are glitter toppers and can be worn year-round over whatever color is in season. We hope you enjoy these holiday-but-not-so-christmas-ey polishes!

See the Instagram hashtag #GypsyannaPolish for more photos and swatches. http://web.stagram.com/tag/GypsyannaPolish/

Please note - 4 mini polishes may be purchased for $14.50!

name: Rudolph's GPS
description:
Rudolph's GPS: red and white dots, and iridescent medium and small squares in a clear base

This magical polish shows how brightly that iconic red nose cuts through an iridescent snow storm! The polish looks lovely over any color, but the square glitter really shines over black or navy.

----------------------

This polish is part of the Dotticure Collection, debuted December 3, 2013. 

While I celebrate and LOVE Christmas time, I totally get that nobody wants a one-day polish. The Dotticure Collection is a fun group of polishes that are winter-appropriate, but can also be worn on Boxing Day, any of the eight days of Hanukkah, or on Christmas. Additionally, all polishes in the collection are glitter toppers and can be worn year-round over whatever color is in season. We hope you enjoy these holiday-but-not-so-christmas-ey polishes!

Please note - 4 mini polishes may be purchased for $14.50!

name: A Dandruff Problem
description:
A Dandruff Problem: white dots, plus YOUR OPTION of white:
 - small squares, 
 - large stars, 
 - medium hexagons, 
 - bars, 
 - large squares, or 
 - plain white dots 
in a clear-silver shimmer clear base. Be sure to note in the comments of your order which option you would like. If you do not, I will make your polish with just white dots.

----------------------

This polish is part of the Dotticure Collection, debuted December 3, 2013.

While I celebrate and LOVE Christmas time, I totally get that nobody wants a one-day polish. The Dotticure Collection is a fun group of polishes that are winter-appropriate, but can also be worn on Boxing Day, any of the eight days of Hanukkah, or on Christmas. name: Forest For the Trees
description:
Forest For the Trees: green holographic dots, gold holographic hexagons in a clear base 

This is truly a favorite phrase of the lawyer set. I have no idea why it is so popular, but it applies to the craziness of the holidays as well. Remember to let the little things go and look to the bigger picture of family, love, and giving back! 

----------------------

This polish is part of the Dotticure Collection, debuted December 3, 2013.

While I celebrate and LOVE Christmas time, I totally get that nobody wants a one-day polish. The Dotticure Collection is a fun group of polishes that are winter-appropriate, but can also be worn on Boxing Day, any of the eight days of Hanukkah, or on Christmas. Additionally, all polishes in the collection are glitter toppers and can be worn year-round over whatever color is in season. We hope you enjoy these holiday-but-not-so-christmas-ey polishes!

See the Instagram hashtag #GypsyannaPolish for more photos and swatches. http://web.stagram.com/tag/GypsyannaPolish/

Please note - 4 mini polishes may be purchased for $14.50!

name: Snowman Kit
description:
Snowman Kit: white dots, orange bar, and black small hexagons in a clear base

Ever thought of all the components of a snowman? "Snowman Kit" from the Dotticure Collection is just that, round white dots for his body, orange bar glitter for his carrot nose, small black hex glitter for his eyes, mouth, and buttons, & black bar glitters for his stick arms! 

----------------------

This polish is part of the Dotticure Collection, debuted December 3, 2013.

While I celebrate and LOVE Christmas time, I totally get that nobody wants a one-day polish. The Dotticure Collection is a fun group of polishes that are winter-appropriate, but can also be worn on Boxing Day, any of the eight days of Hanukkah, or on Christmas. Additionally, all polishes in the collection are glitter toppers and can be worn year-round over whatever color is in season. We hope you enjoy these holiday-but-not-so-christmas-ey polishes!

See the Instagram hashtag #GypsyannaPolish for more photos and swatches. http://web.stagram.com/tag/GypsyannaPolish/

Please note - 4 mini polishes may be purchased for $14.50!

name: Pointe Shoes and Tutus
description:
Pointe Shoes and Tutus: coral and mint dots in a clear base

I have been in dozens of productions of the Nutcracker. Nothing says winter holidays to me like this beautiful ballet. This polish is just the perfect combo of mint and coral just like the waltz of the flowers tutus and pointe shoes worn by hundreds of ballerinas each year!

----------------------

This polish is part of the Dotticure Collection, debuted December 3, 2013.

While I celebrate and LOVE Christmas time, I totally get that nobody wants a one-day polish. The Dotticure Collection is a fun group of polishes that are winter-appropriate, but can also be worn on Boxing Day, any of the eight days of Hanukkah, or on Christmas. Additionally, all polishes in the collection are glitter toppers and can be worn year-round over whatever color is in season. We hope you enjoy these holiday-but-not-so-christmas-ey polishes!

See the Instagram hashtag #GypsyannaPolish for more photos and swatches. http://web.stagram.com/tag/GypsyannaPolish/

Please note - 4 mini polishes may be purchased for $14.50!

name: Ball Drop
description:
Ball Drop: black dots, small gold holographic hexagons, and rose gold holographic hexagons in a clear- gold shimmer base

10... 9... 8... The count-down is always a favorite moment on new year's eve, so why not have a polish that constantly depicts the explosion of fireworks and mayhem that erupts when the ball drops at midnight?! 

----------------------

This polish is part of the Dotticure Collection, debuted December 3, 2013.

While I celebrate and LOVE Christmas time, I totally get that nobody wants a one-day polish. The Dotticure Collection is a fun group of polishes that are winter-appropriate, but can also be worn on Boxing Day, any of the eight days of Hanukkah, or on Christmas. Additionally, all polishes in the collection are glitter toppers and can be worn year-round over whatever color is in season. We hope you enjoy these holiday-but-not-so-christmas-ey polishes!

See the Instagram hashtag #GypsyannaPolish for more photos and swatches. http://web.stagram.com/tag/GypsyannaPolish/

Please note - 4 mini polishes may be purchased for $14.50!

name: The Only Male In Our Herd
description: Dark silver opaque metallic. So I am the oldest of 5 children. There are four girls and one boy, Luke, or as we taught our youngest sister to call him since her birth, Luka. The story behind this one is set in Spring of 2012. My husband (Mr. Gypsyanna?) and I took my two youngest sisters to the zoo. While watching the elephants, the zookeeper told the crowd, "And that big guy over there is the only male in our herd." My youngest sister, who was 5 at the time, turns to me and said, "Just like Luka! He's the only male in our herd!" If you love something a little different than your typical indie glitter, this polish is for you! It is a great metallic that is perfect in two coats, but you could get away with just one if you're short on time. The iridescence of the metallic looks beautiful in the sun, and in the shade, it is the perfect charcoal grey! See the Instagram hashtag #GypsyannaPolish for more photos and swatches. http://web.stagram.com/tag/GypsyannaPolish/ Please note - 4 mini polishes may be purchased for $14.50!

name: 1000 Glitters
description:
Topper with black and silver glitter.

This polish is in celebration of my 1000+ followers on Instagram!
There isn't a back story beyond that. However, this is one polish that can stand alone!

A clear base glitter polish packed with tiny black squares, small silver and black hexagons, and larger holographic silver hexagons. It contrasts beautifully over pale colors, and would be awesome in a milky jelly sandwich!

See the Instagram hashtag #GypsyannaPolish for more photos and swatches. http://web.stagram.com/tag/GypsyannaPolish/

Please note - 4 mini polishes may be purchased for $14.50!

name: Magic Nail
description:
Clear-based iridescent glitter topper.

A friend of mine is marrying a hilarious man who is very interested in all aspects of her manicures. She told me that he was so excited about helping her pick out polish combos and colors that he not only knew the name of a "party nail" and forgot it, he even came up with his own name for the infamous stand alone digit: magic nail.
Then one day I received this email:
"Hi, I just stumbled across this website randomly and I love your nail polish!! Wow! So many glittery colors......how do you do it?!
I was wondering if you have any nail polish for men? Personally, I think a peach-cr√®me or pinkish-spritz just POPS against my skin tone! Man! I'm getting really excited! (Seriously, I love talking about nail polish :) )
But in all seriousness, you need to make a polish called 'Magic Nail.' Do it, and call me when you do."

So, I did. 

Magic Nail is the perfect polish for your ring finger. The medium and small size hexagons and squares are translucent, adding sparkle and depth to any color polish. We especially love this polish over bright pedicure colors and over simple white manicures!

See the Instagram hashtag #GypsyannaPolish for more photos and swatches. http://web.stagram.com/tag/GypsyannaPolish/

Please note - 4 mini polishes may be purchased for $14.50!

name: Spectraflair Top Coat
description:
Just your regular old spectraflair top coat....... Not! Have you seen a specraflair top coat in action?! It's the best rainbow-ey polish ever! Put this bad boy over any other polish and then step out into the sun for the most amazing mini light show.

This top coat looks amazing over bright colors and really shines in direct sunlight. But take it for a spin over a light color and it will still have tons of rainbow reflection!

The materials to make this polish are slightly more expensive, so the price reflects this added cost.

See the Instagram hashtag #GypsyannaPolish for more photos and swatches. http://web.stagram.com/tag/GypsyannaPolish/

Please note - 4 mini polishes may be purchased for $14.50!

name: Always Be A Unicorn
description: Wondering what my most recent polish name is all about? This. @10_4Sputnik posted this on my Facebook wall a long time ago. It was the funniest thing I'd ever seen. And so true.

name: I Want To Watch Elmo!
description:
Red-orange jelly with primary colors medium metallic glitter and tiny yellow glitter

I have three little sisters. I call them "my sister," "my little sister," and "my youngest sister." That said, my sister is four years younger than me. When she was little she didn't talk much, we figured she just didn't have any thing to say. But then three years into her lifetime, she bursts out one morning with a full sentence! "I want to watch Elmo!" was the first thing my sister said, and so pretty much every day after that, she did. 

This is a red-orange jelly with medium hexes in primary colors. But the best part is the tiny yellow hex glitter that glow in a black light! This polish looks amazing over orange or red, and gives a really unique look to black polish as well!

Photo is L: two coats, no top coat. R: two coats over Sephora by OPI And a Cherry on Top 

See the Instagram hashtag #GypsyannaPolish for more photos and swatches. http://web.stagram.com/tag/GypsyannaPolish/

name: The Movie Title (Catch Phrase Collection)
description:
[Neon Pink]
This is a black-light responsive neon pink. Over white this polish is hot pink, but on its own this polish looks neon orange-pink! This polish dries matte, but also looks awesome with a good topcoat to make it shine.

The photo is two coats of The Movie Title topped with Optimistic Advice under a black-light.

See the Instagram hashtag #GypsyannaPolish for more photos and swatches. http://web.stagram.com/tag/GypsyannaPolish/

Please note - 4 mini polishes may be purchased for $14.50! Or the entire 5 polish mini collection may be purchased for $18.00.

name: Overreaction (Catch Phrase Collection)
description:
[Neon Yellow]
This is a very black-light responsive neon yellow. It looks best over white, but can be worn alone on the nail as well. Also try Overreaction over a black polish for some surprising results! This polish dries matte, but also looks awesome with a good topcoat to make it shine.

The photos are of two coats of Overreaction, and Overreaction topped with Optimistic Advice under a black-light.

See the Instagram hashtag #GypsyannaPolish for more photos and swatches. http://web.stagram.com/tag/GypsyannaPolish/

Please note - 4 mini polishes may be purchased for $14.50! Or the entire 5 polish mini collection may be purchased for $18.00.

name: Flavors
description:
Clear-based neon glitter topper.

This inspiration behind "Flavors" comes from my little sister. Like most children she was not allowed to chew bubble gum when she was a toddler. She tended to swallow it like candy, and my parents tended to think that was bad. One day she came into the room, clearly chewing a large wad of gum, and when our dad asked her if she had gum in her mouth she responded, "Well... it has gum flavors......" She was such an evasive three year old!

Flavors is a blacklight responsive glitter topper with medium neon pink and neon green hexagon glitters, and tiny neon yellow glitter all packed into a clear base. Flavors is a bright addition to any neutral polish and looks unique over grey! Our personal favorite, however, is to top a dark purple with this neon confection!

See the Instagram hashtag #GypsyannaPolish and #GypsyannaPolishFan for more photos and swatches. http://web.stagram.com/tag/GypsyannaPolish/

Please note - 4 mini polishes may be purchased for $14.50!

name: Tinkervention
description:
Blacklight responsive glitter topper.

This is both a play on Tinkerbell and the "Interventions" which are so popular on the TV show How I Met Your Mother... Let me explain...
For my entire life my favorite color has been green. Bright green at that. So every year for Christmas and my birthday, my family members (and Santa!) have given me gifts that reflect my favorite color. For a period of about 12 years I received every Tinkerbell coffee mug Disney had to offer. My friends and family's rationale was that she was the only Disney "princess" who had a green theme. While I love all things Disney, and I also liked Tinkerbell quite a bit, by the time I was 18 my collection of over 25 Tinkerbell coffee mugs was getting out of hand (especially considering I had just moved into a tiny college dorm room)! So I had to sit down with my family and have an intervention of the Tinkerbell kind. I gently let them know how much I appreciated the mugs, and their kind gifts, but that I just could not house any more Tinkerbell items!
They took it pretty well, and I only occasionally receive Tinkerbell gifts these days!


This is a neon green and neon yellow glitter topper in a clear base. The yellow glitter glows bright in a blacklight! Also there is some spectrafliar holographic goodness packed into the clear base. While this polish could be worn directly on the nail, it really comes to life over dark colors! Also try it over white for some neon bright goodness!

See the Instagram hashtag #GypsyannaPolish for more photos and swatches. http://web.stagram.com/tag/GypsyannaPolish/

Please note - 4 mini polishes may be purchased for $14.50!

name: Midnight Snack
description:
Dark royal blue matte with scattered holographic shimmer.

I LOVE to snack. I love to eat little bites of food constantly. In fact, when I started dating my husband he noticed that every single night, at midnight if I was still awake, I wanted a snack. I never noticed the timing, but this snacking habit has held true our entire relationship thus far (6 years!). So in dedication to my love of food, I named this nail polish (my other love lol) Midnight Snack. Oh and also it's a beautiful shade of midnight blue. =)


See the Instagram hashtag #GypsyannaPolish for more photos and swatches. http://web.stagram.com/tag/GypsyannaPolish/
And tag your own Gypsyanna Polish swatches with #GypsyannaPolishFan on Instagram and Facebook!

Please note - 4 mini polishes may be purchased for $14.50!

name: Ocean Hex-stacy
description:
Blue jelly polish with neon hexagon glitter.

This polish was named by Instagram's own @KimbersKorner! We chose the name Hex-stacy that she suggested because it was the perfect combo of wild and blatantly obvious. We also wanted to keep the aquatic theme that a lot of people suggested, and so we landed on the name Ocean Hex-stacy! We hope you enjoy this neon jelly as much as we do!

Ocean Hex-stacy is a bright blue transparent jelly based polish with medium neon pink and blue hexagon glitter, small white glitter, and tiny blue glitter. It is amazing over a royal blue spectraflair polish (as show in the swatch) but also looks great over purple and light blue, or even black!

See the Instagram hashtag #GypsyannaPolish and #GypsyannaPolishFan for more photos and swatches. http://web.stagram.com/tag/GypsyannaPolish/

Please note - 4 mini polishes may be purchased for $14.50!

name: Hawaiian Sunset
description:
A bright blue-gray metallic with green shifting flecks.

The Instagram winner of the "Gyspyanna Naming Polish Contest" was @lilmisspixie86. Here is her story:
"Both of my grandfathers (I've only known one due to cancer taking my dad's dad a year after they married) had bright blue-gray eyes with flecks of green as do I and my son Levi. Long before my grandfathers met they both always called their eye color 'Hawaiian Sunset Blue'. My eye color is the one remaining connection to the grandfather who I've always felt has watched over me, and now watches over his first great grandson as well. My name for a polish would be: Hawaiian Sunset Blue."

This polish is as unique and loveable as the story behind it. With a metallic base of bright blue and grey it is a polish that can be worn without any other adornment. The small flecks in the polish shift from blue to green when they catch the light. 

See the Instagram hashtag #GypsyannaPolish for more photos and swatches. http://web.stagram.com/tag/GypsyannaPolish/

Please note - 4 mini polishes may be purchased for $14.50!

name: Grunion Run
description:
Blue jelly with many blue glitters, including holo teal hexes and matte teal diamonds.

Every full moon at about midnight, but only when it is warm out, these really crazy creatures swim up onto the beaches in my home town and lay eggs in the sand. It's a tradition with people who live nearby to try and catch the Grunion Run. One year my whole family decided to see them, they all bundled up, got in the car, and stared at a dark beach for 3 hours. I was not living at home by this time, but received many dark photos from various members of my family simply stating, "Still waiting for the grunions...." In the end I don't think the grunions even came that night, but the excitement of getting to stay out late at the beach, and seeing a bunch of people lined up on the wet sand waiting for the grunions really stuck with my siblings and we all still talk about it!

This is a blue jelly with amazing sparkle. It looks great over any blue or purple - but especially a darker one. Grunion Run also looks fantastic over black or dark green!


See the Instagram hashtag #GypsyannaPolish for more photos and swatches. http://web.stagram.com/tag/GypsyannaPolish/

Please note - 4 mini polishes may be purchased for $14.50!

[The large hexagon glitter do curl slightly. However, this does not have an effect on the application as the glitter lies flat under a top coat. The high quality glitter was purchased from Gypsyanna Polish's normal distributor and has been tested for solvent resistance in a suspension base for over 2 months.]

name: But Daddy, I Love Him!
description:
Clear base with teal diamonds, teal hexes, white stars, and lavender/teal holo. 

So number one, this is from the movie The Little Mermaid, obviously. But apparently it is also a quote I said as a child, because I was a crazy. But even more crazy, is that, with out any prior knowledge, my little sister ALSO SAID THIS QUOTE when she was about three years old. The story goes, back when I was in high school, I had photos of all my friends on my binder (I know, right?). Included in these photos was a boy we shall call Bambi. My little sister decided Bambi was her boyfriend (I don't know that she had really ever met him) and would steal the photo of him out of my binder all the time! My dad finally got a little weirded out that his three year old had a 17 year old "boyfriend" and told her to stop stealing the photo. She responded with tears in her eyes, "but Daddy, I love him!" 

This is a great glitter bomb topper. The tiny holo hexes catch all the light and the stars give the polish that little magical something. You will love it over white, black, lavender, or even green!


See the Instagram hashtag #GypsyannaPolish for more photos and swatches. http://web.stagram.com/tag/GypsyannaPolish/

Please note - 4 mini polishes may be purchased for $14.50!

[The large hexagon glitter do curl slightly. However, this does not have an effect on the application as the glitter lies flat under a top coat. The high quality glitter was purchased from Gypsyanna Polish's normal distributor and has been tested for solvent resistance in a suspension base for over 2 months.]

name: Furry Wall
description: Black and white bar glitter topper. I feel like the lyrics to this song are enough of an explanation. So without further ado, "Furry Walls" by "Infant Sorrow" as sang by Aldous Snow (Russel Brand) in Get Him To The Greek: Yeeeaaaaahhhhh Yeeeaaaaahhhhh When the world slips you a Jeffery, Stroke the furry wall, Stroke the furry wall, Furry walls don't bring me down, Furry walls please stay around, Furry walls, Furry walls Furry walls kiss me to sleep, Furry walls please help me read, Furry walls, Furry walls Furry walls can take you on a magic carpet ride, Furry walls surround you till you got no place to hide, Let your furry fingers be your guide Furry walls turn out the light, Furry walls please stay the night, Furry walls, Furry walls ... ¬© EMI Music Publishing, Universal Music Publishing Group Songwriters: Viola, Michael Anthony / Bern, Dan / Apatow, Judd This glitter topper was made to go over bright contrasting colors, like red and bright blue. But a friend of mine put it over a light pink during its "proto-type" phase and I Loved It! So pretty much this monochromatic glitter can be put over anything. And it looks awesome. See the Instagram hashtag #GypsyannaPolish for more photos and swatches. http://web.stagram.com/tag/GypsyannaPolish/ Please note - 4 mini polishes may be purchased for $14.50!

name: Optimistic Advice (Catch Phrase Collection)
description:
[White Matte Glitter Topper]
This is a clear base with black-light responsive white glitter in small squares, medium hexagon, and large square shapes. It is meant to go over each of the rest of the polishes in this collection, but looks great over all polishes! Also works well in a jelly sandwich type manicure!

See the Instagram hashtag #GypsyannaPolish for more photos and swatches. http://web.stagram.com/tag/GypsyannaPolish/

Please note - 4 mini polishes may be purchased for $14.50! Or the entire 5 polish mini collection may be purchased for $18.00.
